definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: Spinning music during Salsa Night, an event for troops on the base.
sentences.chinese: 莎莎舞會是基地部隊的一項盛事，舞會上有激情音樂。

sentences.english: It is a great honor to me to join this world-wide big event.
sentences.chinese: 參加這個國際化的大型盛事，是給予我的榮譽。

sentences.english: FAW's HQD Concept is a scary-looking Chinese-style Rolls-Royce Phantom!
sentences.chinese: 一氣紅旗盛事是一款嚇人的中國版勞斯萊斯幻影。

sentences.english: Zheng He's seven expeditions was the great feat in Ming Dynasty, its influence is wide and deep.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和七航，乃明季盛事，其影響既廣且深。

sentences.english: But would South Africa really want to stage another sporting mega-event? The cost of hosting the World Cup has been vast.
sentences.chinese: 但南非真的想再次主辦另一項體育盛事嗎？

sentences.english: Is there a single country that is pure enough to pass muster as a host of a major sporting event?
sentences.chinese: 那兒還又沒有一個國家潔身自理去主辦一場體育盛事？

sentences.english: The only people who seemed to enjoy it were the great horned Owls.
sentences.chinese: 唯一看起來享受這盛事的就是大角梟了。

sentences.english: These Games belong to you. They are your Games.
sentences.chinese: 這場盛事屬於你們，這是你們的比賽。

sentences.english: This incredible event is an important opportunity to strengthen the UK-China partnership.
sentences.chinese: 這項盛事將會爲加強中英合作帶來中要機遇。

sentences.english: I learnt a lot about the glorious events happened in the family from the website.
sentences.chinese: 我在網上學到很多有關我們孔家的盛事。

sentences.english: Tickets to Olympic events were delivered to home in august last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年八月奧運會盛事門卷已開始送上門。

sentences.english: That will be good news for the country's reputation and a successful event.
sentences.chinese: 對該國的榮譽和成功的盛事而言，這將是一個好消息。

sentences.english: The annual event, similar to American state fairs, will run until April 4.
sentences.chinese: 這項類似美國州展的年度盛事，將進行至四月四日。

sentences.english: The Oscars is one of the most glamorous events in the world.
sentences.chinese: 美國奧斯卡大獎是世界矚目的電影盛事。

sentences.english: What kind of football venue was this?
sentences.chinese: 這算是哪門子的足球盛事？

sentences.english: The tour of the Liang Yuan in the Chinese history of literature is a worth noting grand occasion.
sentences.chinese: 梁園之遊是中國文學史上一件值得注意的盛事。

definition: to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to get together all at once
